channel.title: Npc Help
channel.description:
Is there some way I can get rid of the useless talk-to options on only CERTAIN npcs? like ifnpcid = 317 displayoption "trade"
I know thats horrible ^^ but just an example. I want it so all my shop nps only have the option of trade. but some other npcs have the option of talk to. help please. My base is the original project insanity.

item.title: Npc Help
item.dc:creator: @ladaswa ladaswa
item.description:

like
